item.name: Angelic Favor
item.text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Angelic Favor's mana cost. Cast Angelic Favor only during combat. Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Avenger en-Dal
item.text: {2}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Exile target attacking creature. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

item.name: Blinding Angel
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips his or her next combat phase.
item.flavorText: "Their eyes will shrivel and blacken before faith's true light."

item.name: Chieftain en-Dal
item.text: Whenever Chieftain en-Dal attacks, attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The clearest commands are practical examples.

item.name: Defender en-Vec
item.text: Fading 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Defender en-Vec: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

item.name: Defiant Falcon
item.text: Flying {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Defiant Vanguard
item.text: When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn. {5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Fanatical Devotion
item.text: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate target creature.
item.flavorText: The Oracle told Eladamri he would save his people by abandoning them. His followers adopted that ideal.

item.name: Lashknife
item.text: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay Lashknife's mana cost. Enchant creature Enchanted creature has first strike.
item.flavorText: Those it won't scare, it scars.

item.name: Lawbringer
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Lawbringer: Exile target red creature.
item.flavorText: One injustice starts a thousand riots. One law stops a thousand crimes. —Lawbringer creed

item.name: Lightbringer
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Lightbringer: Exile target black creature.
item.flavorText: One thought opens a thousand eyes. One sun brings a thousand dawns. —Lightbringer creed

item.name: Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero
item.text: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. {3}: Put target Rebel card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

item.name: Netter en-Dal
item.text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't attack this turn.
item.flavorText: The wizard's vocabulary of mogg profanities increased with every net she cast.

item.name: Noble Stand
item.text: Whenever a creature you control blocks, you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: Soldiers will always endanger their lives to defend many other lives.

item.name: Off Balance
item.text: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
item.flavorText: A heavy weapon deals plenty of damage—but it does have to hit.

item.name: Oracle's Attendants
item.text: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.
item.flavorText: The future isn't sacred, but its speaker is.

item.name: Parallax Wave
item.text: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Parallax Wave: Exile target creature. When Parallax Wave leaves the battlefield, each player returns to the battlefield all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Wave.

item.name: Seal of Cleansing
item.text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: "I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows." —Seal inscription

item.name: Silkenfist Fighter
item.text: Whenever Silkenfist Fighter becomes blocked, untap it.
item.flavorText: Simple wooden staff Made from life, protecting life, Stronger than cold steel.

item.name: Silkenfist Order
item.text: Whenever Silkenfist Order becomes blocked, untap it.

item.name: Sivvi's Ruse
item.text: If an opponent controls a Mountain and you control a Plains, you may cast Sivvi's Ruse without paying its mana cost. Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.

item.name: Sivvi's Valor
item.text:
If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay the mana cost of Sivvi's Valor.
All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to you instead.

item.name: Spiritual Asylum
item.text: Creatures and lands you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) When a creature you control attacks, sacrifice Spiritual Asylum.
item.flavorText: Trapped in safety is still trapped.

item.name: Topple
item.text: Exile target creature with the greatest power. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target any one of them.)
item.flavorText: "Let all witness the fate of those who defy me." —Crovax

item.name: Voice of Truth
item.text: Flying, protection from white
item.flavorText: "Above them all is Truth, and Truth must be set free. If the wings of Truth are clipped, the voices will fall silent." —Song of All, canto 167

item.name: Accumulated Knowledge
item.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.
item.flavorText: "I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you." —Takara, to Eladamri

item.name: Æther Barrier
item.text: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, that player sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {1}.
item.flavorText: "Creatures fade in and out of existence. It's an unfortunate side effect. The losses are tolerable." —Belbe

item.name: Air Bladder
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: Random mutations among Rootwater merfolk were common—and disturbing.

item.name: Cloudskate
item.text: Flying Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

item.name: Daze
item.text:
You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Daze's mana cost.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

item.name: Dominate
item.text: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X or less. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
item.flavorText: "I've come to reclaim what is mine. And you, Greven, are mine." —Volrath

item.name: Ensnare
item.text:
You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay Ensnare's mana cost.
Tap all creatures.
item.flavorText: Rootwater has become as dangerous to its denizens as to its enemies.

item.name: Infiltrate
item.text: Target creature is unblockable this turn.
item.flavorText: Getting in was the easy part. Getting out proved to be more difficult.

item.name: Jolting Merfolk
item.text: Fading 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Jolting Merfolk: Tap target creature.

item.name: Oraxid
item.text: Protection from red
item.flavorText: "I'm constantly amazed by the tenacity of living creatures on this plane. Even in the stronghold's white-hot core, life persists." —Ertai

item.name: Pale Moon
item.text: Until end of turn, if a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.
item.flavorText: Denizens of Rath had never seen the moon before. It was a symbol of change, not constancy.

item.name: Parallax Tide
item.text: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Parallax Tide: Exile target land. When Parallax Tide leaves the battlefield, each player returns to the battlefield all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Tide.

item.name: Rising Waters
item.text:
Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land he or she controls.
item.flavorText: Rising waters, sinking hope.

item.name: Rootwater Commando
item.text: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.)
item.flavorText: Rootwater merfolk are seldom seen these days, but elf corpses are as numerous as ever.

item.name: Rootwater Thief
item.text: {U}: Rootwater Thief gains flying until end of turn. Whenever Rootwater Thief deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, search that player's library for a card and exile it, then the player shuffles his or her library.

item.name: Seahunter
item.text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Merfolk permanent card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "They can't feel pain. They just wiggle 'cause they're scared."

item.name: Seal of Removal
item.text: Sacrifice Seal of Removal: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "I am the unraveler, the loosened thread that will not hold." —Seal inscription

item.name: Sliptide Serpent
item.text: {3}{U}: Return Sliptide Serpent to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: It's futile to fight something you can see only in the corner of your eye.

item.name: Sneaky Homunculus
item.text: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
item.flavorText: Keep watch only for the giants and you'll be eaten by the ants.

item.name: Stronghold Biologist
item.text: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target creature spell.
item.flavorText: He twists the laws of nature until they scream.

item.name: Stronghold Machinist
item.text: {U}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target noncreature spell.
item.flavorText: She stretches the laws of physics until they snap.

item.name: Stronghold Zeppelin
item.text: Flying Stronghold Zeppelin can block only creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: As long as the stronghold controlled the sky, the rebels were doomed.

item.name: Submerge
item.text: If an opponent controls a Forest and you control an Island, you may cast Submerge without paying its mana cost. Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

item.name: Trickster Mage
item.text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
item.flavorText: "If it ain't broke, I'll break it. If it is broke, I'll fix it."

item.name: Wandering Eye
item.text:
Flying
All players play with their hands revealed.
item.flavorText: The evincar has many ways of keeping track of his subjects.

item.name: Ascendant Evincar
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Other black creatures get +1/+1. Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.
item.flavorText: "Things are going to change around here." —Crovax

item.name: Battlefield Percher
item.text: Flying Battlefield Percher can block only creatures with flying. {1}{B}: Battlefield Percher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Belbe's Percher
item.text: Flying Belbe's Percher can block only creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: Long and powerful, these birds were used to carry messages to and from the evincar.

item.name: Carrion Wall
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}{B}: Regenerate Carrion Wall.
item.flavorText: A wall built from the bodies of the enemy will never lack building material in times of war.

item.name: Dark Triumph
item.text:
If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay Dark Triumph's mana cost.
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: All that's left is the coronation.

item.name: Death Pit Offering
item.text: When Death Pit Offering enters the battlefield, sacrifice all creatures you control. Creatures you control get +2/+2.
item.flavorText: "Kill them all and feed them to the new recruits." —Crovax

item.name: Divining Witch
item.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Name a card. Exile the top six cards of your library. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal the named card, then put that card into your hand. Exile all other cards revealed this way.

item.name: Massacre
item.text: If an opponent controls a Plains and you control a Swamp, you may cast Massacre without paying its mana cost. All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.name: Mind Slash
item.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
item.flavorText: "I can't think with all that screaming."

item.name: Mind Swords
item.text: If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay Mind Swords's mana cost. Each player exiles two cards from his or her hand.

item.name: Murderous Betrayal
item.text: {B}{B}, Pay half your life rounded up: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: In darkness, the assassin sneaked into the village and destroyed what Eladamri loved most: his daughter.

item.name: Parallax Dementia
item.text: Enchant creature Fading 1 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with one fade counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+2. When Parallax Dementia leaves the battlefield, destroy enchanted creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

item.name: Parallax Nexus
item.text: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Parallax Nexus: Target opponent exiles a card from his or her hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. When Parallax Nexus leaves the battlefield, each player returns to his or her hand all cards he or she owns exiled with Parallax Nexus.

item.name: Phyrexian Driver
item.text: When Phyrexian Driver enters the battlefield, all other Mercenary creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Although the abuse was initially effective, the troops soon became numb to it.

item.name: Phyrexian Prowler
item.text: Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Phyrexian Prowler: Phyrexian Prowler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Plague Witch
item.text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I can ail what cures you."

item.name: Rathi Assassin
item.text: {1}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped nonblack creature. {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Rathi Fiend
item.text: When Rathi Fiend enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life. {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Rathi Intimidator
item.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Seal of Doom
item.text: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "I am the banisher, the ill will that snuffs the final candle." —Seal inscription

item.name: Spineless Thug
item.text: Spineless Thug can't block.
item.flavorText: These troops are only as strong as the evincar's control.

item.name: Spiteful Bully
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Spiteful Bully deals 3 damage to target creature you control.
item.flavorText: Like most creatures bent on total destruction, they rarely bother to double-check their targets.

item.name: Stronghold Discipline
item.text: Each player loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls.
item.flavorText: "Crovax never passes up an opportunity to cause widespread misery." —Belbe

item.name: Vicious Hunger
item.text: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "Blood is foul, the flesh dross. My ascendance thirsts for life itself." —Crovax

item.name: Volrath the Fallen
item.text: {1}{B}, Discard a creature card: Volrath the Fallen gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "I stepped out. I did not step down."

item.name: Ancient Hydra
item.text: Fading 5 (This creature enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) {1}, Remove a fade counter from Ancient Hydra: Ancient Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Arc Mage
item.text: {2}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Arc Mage deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

item.name: Bola Warrior
item.text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't block this turn.
item.flavorText: The ingredients for panic include equal parts danger, uncertainty, and helplessness.

item.name: Downhill Charge
item.text:
You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay Downhill Charge's mana cost.
Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

item.name: Flame Rift
item.text: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.
item.flavorText: Crovax hungered for power, and the stronghold devoured the sky.

item.name: Flowstone Crusher
item.text: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Someone must have done something very bad to make a rock that angry." —Rebel scout

item.name: Flowstone Overseer
item.text: {R}{R}: Target creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The rebels couldn't see where the roar was coming from. Then they saw it was coming from everywhere.

item.name: Flowstone Slide
item.text: All creatures get +X/-X until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It may look like soil, but its nature is malice.

item.name: Flowstone Strike
item.text: Target creature gets +1/-1 and gains haste until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Aggression exacts its toll.

item.name: Flowstone Surge
item.text: Creatures you control get +1/-1.
item.flavorText: The army was never at a loss for weapons; Crovax was their forge.

item.name: Flowstone Wall
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Flowstone Wall gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The rebels assaulted the wall, never suspecting the wall would assault back.

item.name: Laccolith Grunt
item.text: Whenever Laccolith Grunt becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Grunt assigns no combat damage this turn.
item.flavorText: They leave a trail of ash and sorrow.

item.name: Laccolith Rig
item.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, the first creature assigns no combat damage this turn.

item.name: Laccolith Titan
item.text: Whenever Laccolith Titan becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Titan assigns no combat damage this turn.
item.flavorText: Proximity guarantees injury or death.

item.name: Laccolith Warrior
item.text: Whenever Laccolith Warrior becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Warrior assigns no combat damage this turn.
item.flavorText: The screams are brief. The silence lingers.

item.name: Laccolith Whelp
item.text: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp assigns no combat damage this turn.
item.flavorText: They don't feed; they stoke.

item.name: Mana Cache
item.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, put a charge counter on Mana Cache for each untapped land that player controls. Remove a charge counter from Mana Cache: Add {1} to your mana pool. Any player may activate this ability but only during his or her turn before the end step.

item.name: Mogg Alarm
item.text: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Mogg Alarm's mana cost. Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: They make mountains into mogg holes.

item.name: Mogg Salvage
item.text: If an opponent controls an Island and you control a Mountain, you may cast Mogg Salvage without paying its mana cost. Destroy target artifact.
item.flavorText: Three moggs, one treasure, too bad.

item.name: Mogg Toady
item.text: Mogg Toady can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player. Mogg Toady can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

item.name: Moggcatcher
item.text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Goblin permanent card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "They're not worth much, but they're easy to catch."

item.name: Rupture
item.text: Sacrifice a creature. Rupture deals damage equal to that creature's power to each creature without flying and each player.
item.flavorText: All creatures have an inner fire. Releasing it can be dangerous.

item.name: Seal of Fire
item.text: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "I am the romancer, the passion that consumes the flesh." —Seal inscription

item.name: Shrieking Mogg
item.text: Haste When Shrieking Mogg enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.
item.flavorText: You have to admire its enthusiasm.

item.name: Stronghold Gambit
item.text: Each player chooses a card in his or her hand. Then each player reveals his or her chosen card. The owner of the creature card revealed this way with the lowest converted mana cost puts that card onto the battlefield. If two or more creature cards are tied for lowest cost, those cards are put onto the battlefield.

item.name: Animate Land
item.text: Until end of turn, target land becomes a 3/3 creature that's still a land.
item.flavorText: Irony is getting walked on by the earth instead of the other way around.

item.name: Blastoderm
item.text: Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

item.name: Coiling Woodworm
item.text: Coiling Woodworm's power is equal to the number of Forests on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Only the elves know where the woods end and the woodworm begins.

item.name: Fog Patch
item.text: Cast Fog Patch only during the declare blockers step. Attacking creatures become blocked. (This spell works on unblockable creatures.)
item.flavorText: Realizing they weren't getting past the fog, the elves did the only thing they could do: wait.

item.name: Harvest Mage
item.text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Until end of turn, if you tap a land for mana, it produces one mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type and amount.
item.flavorText: "Why should one limit oneself to the resources at hand?"

item.name: Mossdog
item.text: Whenever Mossdog becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Mossdog.
item.flavorText: The more you look at it, the more dangerous it becomes.

item.name: Nesting Wurm
item.text: Trample When Nesting Wurm enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Nesting Wurm, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

item.name: Overlaid Terrain
item.text: As Overlaid Terrain enters the battlefield, sacrifice all lands you control. Lands you control have "{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."
item.flavorText: One must reap before one can sow.

item.name: Pack Hunt
item.text: Search your library for up to three cards with the same name as target creature, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The one you see is just a diversion.

item.name: Refreshing Rain
item.text: If an opponent controls a Swamp and you control a Forest, you may cast Refreshing Rain without paying its mana cost. Target player gains 6 life.

item.name: Reverent Silence
item.text:
If you control a Forest, you may have each other player gain 6 life rather than pay Reverent Silence's mana cost.
Destroy all enchantments.

item.name: Rhox
item.text: You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked. {2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

item.name: Saproling Burst
item.text: Fading 7 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with seven fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Put a green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst." When Saproling Burst leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens put onto the battlefield with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.

item.name: Saproling Cluster
item.text: {1}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. Any player may activate this ability.

item.name: Seal of Strength
item.text: Sacrifice Seal of Strength: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I am the feeder, the morsel that revives the starving." —Seal inscription

item.name: Skyshroud Behemoth
item.text: Fading 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Skyshroud Behemoth enters the battlefield tapped.

item.name: Skyshroud Claim
item.text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The forest's constant struggle is to keep the spreading flowstone at bay.

item.name: Skyshroud Cutter
item.text: If you control a Forest, you may have each other player gain 5 life rather than pay Skyshroud Cutter's mana cost.

item.name: Skyshroud Poacher
item.text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for an Elf permanent card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "It's OK. They're just elves."

item.name: Skyshroud Ridgeback
item.text: Fading 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

item.name: Skyshroud Sentinel
item.text: When Skyshroud Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Skyshroud Sentinel, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

item.name: Stampede Driver
item.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."

item.name: Treetop Bracers
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: Gravity is truly what you make of it.

item.name: Wild Mammoth
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more creatures than each other player, that player gains control of Wild Mammoth.
item.flavorText: "Sit. Heel Down HELP"

item.name: Woodripper
item.text: Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) {1}, Remove a fade counter from Woodripper: Destroy target artifact.

item.name: Belbe's Armor
item.text: {X}, {T}: Target creature gets -X/+X until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It protects her from the ravages of Phyrexia and the savages of Rath.

item.name: Belbe's Portal
item.text: As Belbe's Portal enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {3}, {T}: You may put a creature card of the chosen type from your hand onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The fight will continue on a new battlefield.

item.name: Complex Automaton
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more permanents, return Complex Automaton to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "This wasteful design cannot possibly be Phyrexian." —Belbe

item.name: Eye of Yawgmoth
item.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Put one into your hand and exile the rest.

item.name: Flint Golem
item.text: Whenever Flint Golem becomes blocked, defending player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

item.name: Flowstone Armor
item.text: You may choose not to untap Flowstone Armor during your untap step. {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/-1 for as long as Flowstone Armor remains tapped.

item.name: Flowstone Thopter
item.text: {1}: Flowstone Thopter gets +1/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Airborne flowstone isn't less dangerous, only less common.

item.name: Kill Switch
item.text: {2}, {T}: Tap all other artifacts. They don't untap during their controllers' untap steps for as long as Kill Switch remains tapped.
item.flavorText: Success is largely a matter of knowing which lever to pull.

item.name: Parallax Inhibitor
item.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Parallax Inhibitor: Put a fade counter on each permanent with fading you control.
item.flavorText: "The best I can offer is a temporary reprieve." —Belbe

item.name: Predator, Flagship
item.text:
{2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: "The scourge of Skyshroud is airborne once more." —Oracle en-Vec

item.name: Rackling
item.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Rackling deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.
item.flavorText: "This may hurt a little."

item.name: Rejuvenation Chamber
item.text: Fading 2 (This artifact enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) {T}: You gain 2 life.

item.name: Rusting Golem
item.text: Fading 5 (This creature enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Rusting Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on it.

item.name: Tangle Wire
item.text: Fading 4 (This artifact enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land he or she controls for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.

item.name: Viseling
item.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Viseling deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.
item.flavorText: "This may hurt a lot."

item.name: Kor Haven
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.

item.name: Rath's Edge
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Rath's Edge deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Terrain Generator
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
